name: Cruelty and maltreatment
text: [§124A-128]  Cruelty and maltreatment.  Any person subject to this chapter who is guilty of cruelty toward, or oppression or maltreatment of, any person subject to the person's orders shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of §2; gen ch 1985]
